articles.title: Pleite der SVB – Was der Finanzwelt jetzt droht
articles.image_title: The Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) logo is seen in this photo illustration in Warsaw, Poland on 13 March, 2023. Silvergate, the second largest bank catering to digital assets companies closed its doors this week in the wake of regulators shutting down Silicon Valley Bank and the crypto-friendly Signature bank losing significantly in value on the NASDAQ exchange.
